description: DUB emerged as a more general replacement for vibe.d's package manager. It does not imply a dependecy to vibe.d for packages and was extended to not only directly build projects, but also to generate project files (currently VisualD). Mono-D also support the use of dub.json (dub's package description) as project file.
summary: Package and build manager for D applications and libraries.
author: https://github.com/orgs/D-Programming-Language/people
